sourcesContent: import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Container, Typography, Grid, Card, CardContent, Button, Box, Paper, Chip } from '@mui/material'; import { School as SchoolIcon, CheckCircle as CheckIcon, Article as BlogIcon, Description as DocsIcon } from '@mui/icons-material'; import { AuthContext } from '../context/AuthContext'; const Home = () => { const { currentUser } = useContext(AuthContext); const schoolInfo = { name: "FPT Junior High School", address: "123 Education Street, Hanoi, Vietnam", phone: "(024) 123-4567", email: "health@fpt-junior.edu.vn", healthOfficeHours: "Monday - Friday: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM", nurseOnDuty: "Nurse Sarah Williams, RN" }; return ( {/* Hero Section */} FPT Junior High School Health Management System Comprehensive health tracking and management for {schoolInfo.name} Our advanced platform ensures the health and safety of all students through digital health records, real-time monitoring, and seamless communication between parents, students, and healthcare providers. {/* Only show Login and Parent Registration buttons when user is not logged in */} {!currentUser && ( <> )} {/* Show welcome message when user is logged in */} {currentUser && ( Welcome back, {currentUser.fullName || currentUser.username}! You are logged in as {currentUser.roles?.join(', ').replace('ROLE_', '')} )} {/* Guest Navigation Section */} {!currentUser && ( )} {/* School Information */} {schoolInfo.name} - Health Office Information Address: {schoolInfo.address} Phone: {schoolInfo.phone} Email: {schoolInfo.email} Health Office Hours: {schoolInfo.healthOfficeHours} Nurse on Duty: {schoolInfo.nurseOnDuty} {/* Health Tips Section */} Daily Health Tips Stay Hydrated Drink plenty of water throughout the day to maintain good health and concentration. Wash Your Hands Regular hand washing with soap and water helps prevent the spread of germs. Get Enough Sleep Adequate sleep is essential for learning, growth, and immune system function. ); }; export default Home;
